detailsData.title: Homepage | Summer Activities | Mountain Bike Lift Rides
detailsData.heading: Over 25 Miles of Beautiful Single-track
detailsData.p1: Certain bike trails may close at any time due to mountain construction projects. Please abide by any closures.
detailsData.p2: Sundance offers 25+ miles of lift-serviced, single-track mountain biking with exciting terrain and breathtaking vistas.
